page.title: 18A Day in the Life of Damian
page.content: I woke up at 7:00 and had my break- fast with my 4 sisters and 2 brothers. I had my usual breakfast of Weetabix, toast and tea. I packed my bag and set off for school.When I reached the bus-stop the bus was there. The journey was boring. I go to Holy Cross High, Hamilton. At 9:00 the bell rang, and I went to my first class, English. My next class was French. At interval I bought a can of ginger beer. Registration was hec- tic as usual. After this I had Maths. At lunchtime I ate my packed lunch and went to Basketball. I had music (my worst subject). My last subject was Religious Education. At hometime I avoid the bus bays because I dislike the noise. At home I had my dinner then watched TV. At 11:30 I had supper and then went to bed until 7:00 the next morning.
